anatomicalTarget._instruction: Add the anatomical target(s) for this position.

targetIdentificationType._instruction: Add the target identification type used to get to this anatomical position.

coordinates._instruction: If possible, add the coordinates that best represent this anatomical position.

additionalRemarks._instruction: Enter any additional remarks that are needed to interpret the properties of this anatomical target position (e.g., what exatly the coordinates represent: central position, bottom, left corner edge, etc).
